definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: She never stopped trying to get pregnant.
sentences.chinese: 她始終沒有停止過嘗試受孕。

sentences.english: The diagram below shows some stages in an ' in vitro ' fertilization program.
sentences.chinese: 圖中顯示某些人工受孕的階段。

sentences.english: The pregnancy rate and the level of testosterone hormone were observed after each mating.
sentences.chinese: 觀察兩次合籠雌鼠受孕率及雄鼠睾酮水平的變化。

sentences.english: But opposition to assisted conception is official papal policy.
sentences.chinese: 但是，反對人工輔助受孕則是教廷的正式立場。

sentences.english: Using the cervical mucus method to promote fertility doesn't pose any risks.
sentences.chinese: 採用宮頸分泌物法來促進受孕沒有任何風險。

sentences.english: Once ovulation resumes, you can become pregnant.
sentences.chinese: 一旦排卵恢復則有可能受孕。

sentences.english: The healthy unsaturated fats seemed to increase successful conception.
sentences.chinese: 健康的不飽和脂肪似乎能夠提高成功受孕的機率。

sentences.english: Clinical pregnancy, miscarriage and delivery rates were also recorded.
sentences.chinese: 臨牀受孕率，流產率和分娩率也被記錄。

sentences.english: Conclusion Fabric softener had reproductive toxicity in pregnant and fetal mice.
sentences.chinese: 衣物柔順劑對孕鼠受孕及胎鼠的發育具有明顯的毒性。

sentences.english: It is the date of the Sun's resurrection and was often celebrated with a blood sacrifice to "impregnate the Earth".
sentences.chinese: 它是太陽復活的日子及經常以血祭慶祝“地球受孕“。

sentences.english: Oils fuels the skin's natural hydration and healing process in the dermis layer of skin where stretch marks form.
sentences.chinese: 油可以給以皮膚自然的水份和癒合真皮層的受孕紋。

sentences.english: DNA was extracted from fetuses at mid-gestation, about 10 days past conception.
sentences.chinese: DNA從受孕大約10天后的中期妊娠胚胎中提取。

sentences.english: For the relationship to exist, a parent must be alive at the time of conception.
sentences.chinese: 要使這一關係成立，父母必須在孩子受孕時還活着。

sentences.english: To produce more sperm and increase the odds of being the one who impregnates the female.
sentences.chinese: 這是爲了產生更多的精子，提高使雌性受孕的機率。

sentences.english: The first trimester is from conception to the end of week 13.
sentences.chinese: 第一期從受孕起到第十三週的最後一天。

sentences.english: Becomes pregnant the date should also arrange in the human body "the biological clock" high-tide period.
sentences.chinese: 受孕日期還應安排在人體“生物鐘”的高潮期。

definition: (of a married couple) to have intercourse/(literary) to share the same room/of the same family branch
euphemism for sexual intercourse/to go to bed with sb
